original_text: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
korean_text: 또 시므온 자손 중에 오백 명이 이시의 아들 블라댜와 느아랴와 르바야와 웃시엘을 두목으로 삼고 세일 산으로 가서

sentences.original_text: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon,
five hundred men, went to mount Seir,
having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah,
